<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragonbone Arrowhead](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1020)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 173 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a melee weapon or a ranged weapon with the  thrown  trait

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This arrowhead, carved from [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50) bone, hangs off the shaft of your weapon. When you activate this talisman, until the end of the current turn, the affixed weapon gains the thrown 20 feet weapon trait, and when you make a thrown Strike with it, it flies back to your hand after the Strike completes. If your hands are full when the weapon returns, it falls to the ground in your space.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragonbone Arrowhead
requirement: You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
